name: Brite Lites
description:
BRITE LITES

Lite-Brite® Toy clone for Windows/Web

Send any feedback to cire666siuol@gmail.com with the title of the game in the subject...

Controls:

At title screen (only downloadable has title screen), click the "Play" button or press any key to play...

In the main game screen, click anywhere in the black area to cycle through available colors (11 colors right now, more may be added) for each 32x32 square, or right click to cycle backwards...

Left click on any of the 3 "Save" buttons to save your work.

Right click on any of the 3 "Load" buttons to load your work.

The 3 saves are separate, so u can save 3 different projects.

Saving/Loading is not available in the HTML5 version, even though the buttons are there.
